title: I am very curious today.
body:
What would happen to players in a professional game if they int'd or went afk etc.

Probably would never happen but i am very curious as to what the outcome would be.

Also, Zoe looks a bootleg, Lux. Ty

replies.body:
You may be interested in Vasilii then. He essentially AFKed in an LSPL match (Challenger series for LPL). He's on Ashe in this video. Watch him closely on the minimap.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wzXTyLyeqy0

The loud bang you hear is him smashing his keyboard BTW. 

Many people who have played with him report being scared that Vasilii would hurt them. He was also banned late this October for supposedly beating his girlfriend on stream. Not a good person in general.
The key note to the story, is that it was all allowed until it was too much.

Ugh, I would assume they would get benched or removed from the team ...

Also, why would a professional gamer want to int or go afk when they work so hard to get into the pro scene all to 'int and afk'.
